price: Onipa (Kaafir’ni) mmrε ho sε ͻsrε papa (firi Nyame hͻ), nanso sε bͻne bi to no a, na n’aba mu abu, na wapa aba.
arabic: لَّا يَسۡـَٔمُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مِن دُعَآءِ ٱلۡخَيۡرِ وَإِن مَّسَّهُ ٱلشَّرُّ فَيَـُٔوسٞ قَنُوطٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: lā yasamu al-insānu min duʿāi al-khayri wa-in massahu al-sharu fayaūsun qanūṭun
